    This is the large graphic element in the ColorPicker that depicts a wide range of colors.

    This is a square, opaque panel used to indicate a certain color.

    This is a rectangular panel used to render one color.
    ContainerProperties
    This helps serialize and deserialize simple UIs based on the names of components.

    JFancyBox
    This component is a distant cousin of a modal dialog: it floats above a RootPaneContainer with a dismissable close decoration.
    JFancyBox.FancyCloseIcon
    A close icon with a border and a light shadow.
    JLink
    This JLabel resembles a hyperlink, and ActionListeners can be attached so it acts like a button.
    JobStatusBar
    A panel that contains a label and a spinning progress bar.
    JThrobber
    This is a simple animated component used to indicate activity when a JProgressBar is either not useful (because a task is indeterminate) or too large (because a task must be expressed in a tiny amount of space).
    LengthSpinner
    A JSpinner that adjusts Length values.
    LengthSpinnerGroup
    Similar to a ButtonGroup: this monitors several LengthSpinners and makes sure they all use the same units.
    LineNumberBorder
    This combines a javax.swing.Border with a LineNumberRenderer to help paint the line numbers for a JTextComponent.
    LineNumberRenderer
    This abstract renderer paints line numbers that relate to a JTextComponent.
